member.name: T:Sitecore.Framework.Rules.Identifiers.Core
member.summary: Contains the Rule Identfiers for the Rule Model entities provided by the Rules framework itself.
member.remarks: To define your own Identifiers, please follow the convention of creating a class inside the Sitecore.Framework.Rules.Identifiers namespace to unambiguously describe the company, project and entity types. e.g. Sitecore.Framework.Rules.Identifiers.MyCompany.MyProject.Actions.MyAction. This will aid consumers to discover all the identifiers available in the system easily.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Framework.Rules.Identifiers.Core.Conditions
member.summary: Contains the Rule Identifiers for the ICondition entities provided by the Rules framework itself.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Framework.Rules.Identifiers.Core.Operators
member.summary: Contains the Rule Identifiers for the unary and binary operator entities provided by the Rules framework itself.
